attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If offenders are to have human rights apparently above those of their victims they must first adhere and accept their responsibilities. They are able to sue prisons, police, probation and others at an apparent whim. If they are successful the money made should automatically go to their victims.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
